about.title: Our Story
about.story1: Two hermanos on separate roads. From smoky desert evenings to clear mountain mornings, each carried half‑baked ideas and lyrics. When, on one fateful day, those roads converged at a quiet crossing, new sounds found breath and two roads became one.
about.story2: Vicios Ocultos, with Luis “Wimi” Reyas and “Poncho” Dillon Lundell, explore the sounds and feelings that emerge from their unique blend of inspirations.
